main event: A yellowish, circular object was observed at rooftop level that moved upward in an arc at Edwards AFB, California.
interesting points: Another observer in the control tower stated the object appeared to be a balloon with a small light attached.
The description of the object was similar to Garnetburg hot-air balloons.
There was no scheduled aircraft or balloon activity in the area at the time of the sighting.
The object was about the size of a barracks window and did not have any discernible features, tail, trail, or exhaust.
The object was silent and was observed for about 5 minutes.
